IntroText: The National Pay-for-Performance Map displays final Pay-for-Performance payment adjustments for your selected year. Click on a hospital's map marker (dot) for more detail, including trended performance. Use the drop-down menu in the upper right corner to alternate between fiscal years. If you'd like to view your hospital(s) detailed performance scores, please visit our Customized Assessment Portal.

RelatedResources.Title: Medicare Hospital Inpatient Pay-for-Performance Webconference FY 2019

Attributes.Name: Base Operating Amount
Attributes.Desc: Derived from CMS inpatient MedPar Medicare discharge file (current year selected or most recent available).

Attributes.Name: Medicare IP Revenue
Attributes.Desc: Derived from CMS inpatient MedPar Medicare discharge file (current year selected or most recent available).

Attributes.Name: Total Impact ($)
Attributes.Desc: Net estimated impact of all three Pay-for-Performance programs for selected fiscal year.

Attributes.Name: Total Impact (%)
Attributes.Desc: Net estimated impact of all three Pay-for-Performance programs for selected fiscal year, calculated as a proportion of all Mericare fee-for-service inpaitent revenue.

Attributes.Name: Final Readmissions Adjustment Factor
Attributes.Desc: Final Readmissions adjustment factor published by CMS. An adjustment factor <1.0000 indicates a penalty.

Attributes.Name: Readmission Impact ($)
Attributes.Desc: Estimated by applying final Readmissions adjustment factor to applicable (or most recent available) base operating amount.

Attributes.Name: Final VBP Adjustment Factor
Attributes.Desc: Final VBP adjustment factor published by CMS. An adjustment factor <1.0000 indicates a penalty; >1.0000 indicates a bonus.

Attributes.Name: VBP Impact ($)
Attributes.Desc: Estimated by applying final VBP adjustment factor to applicable (or most recent available) base operating amount.

Attributes.Name: HAC Penalty Flag
Attributes.Desc: HAC Penalty Flag indicates whether this facility received a 1% HAC penalty (Y/N).

Attributes.Name: HAC Impact ($)
Attributes.Desc: Estimated by applying HAC adjustment to Medicare IP Revenue amount after HRRP and VBP adjustments have been accounted for.
